value.title: Maine Residents Urged to Keep an Eye Out for Missing Llama

value.title: Facebook rules allowing fake Biden “pedophile” video deemed “incoherent”
value.excerpt: A fake video manipulated to falsely depict President Joe Biden inappropriately touching his granddaughter has revealed flaws in Facebook's "deepfake" policies, Meta's Oversight Board concluded Monday.

value.title: A baby llama has possibly been stolen from Maine farm
value.excerpt: Mainers should be on the lookout for a baby llama that was possibly stolen from a farm in Acton. Acton Animal Control Officer Jim Driscoll was notified Sunday about a possibly stolen llama. He is asking farmers and neighbors in the area of Foxes Ridge and County roads to look out for the animal.

value.title: Meta Platforms to deploy in-house custom chips this year to power AI drive: internal memo
value.excerpt: Facebook owner Meta Platforms plans to deploy into its data centres this year a new version of a custom chip aimed at supporting its artificial intelligence push, according to an internal company document.

value.title: Meta Released a Specialized version of Llama 2 for Code Generation
value.excerpt: Based on the open-source Llama 2, one of the largest LLMs in the world, with 175 billion parameters, Code Llama is a collection of pre-trained and fine-tuned generative text models ranging in scale from 7 billion to 70 billion parameters.

value.title: First ‘truly’ open source LLM from AI2 to drive ‘critical shift’ in AI development
value.excerpt: The non-profit Allen Institute for AI (AI2) announced today that it has introduced OLMo, which it calls the first 'truly' open source LLM.

value.title: Exclusive: AI healthcare software startup Cohere Health just raised $50 million
value.excerpt: Cohere Health just raised $50 million in Series B funding. The AI startup automates prior authorizations for health insurance plans like Humana.

value.title: Mistral CEO confirms ‘leak’ of new open source AI model nearing GPT-4 performance
value.excerpt: An anonymous user on 4chan posted a link to the miqu-1-70b files on 4chan. The open source model approaches GPT-4 performance.

value.title: IBM Doubles Down On Its AI Cloud
value.excerpt: IBM has doubled capacity in its Vela Cloud, part of the IBM Cloud offering, to enable its clients to refine more and larger models.

value.title: How To Break The “Fear Factor” Of AI Adoption
value.excerpt: Despite AI’s potential to transform how organizations work, we’re seeing slower adoption and deployment, possibly because of workers’ misplaced fear.

value.title: A View Of Artificial Intelligence (AI) From The Trenches

value.title: Meta Debuts Code Llama 70B: A Powerful Code Generation AI Model
value.excerpt: With Code Llama 70B, enterprises have a choice to host a capable code generation model in their private environment. This gives them control and confidence in protecting their intellectual property.

value.title: Hugging Face teams up with Google to accelerate open AI development
value.excerpt: Hugging Face users training AI models will also be able to tap hardware capabilities offered with Google Cloud, including TPUs, A3 VMs, powered by Nvidia H100 Tensor Core GPUs and C3 VMs.

value.title: Google Suddenly Reveals Huge Free AI Upgrade For All Android Users
value.excerpt: Google has spent two-years pushing its Messages app as the default Android alternative to iMessage. This has included end-to-end encryption and RCS by default, and multiple feature releases. Now, with that done, here comes an AI upgrade that connects Messages users with Google, not just with one another.
